Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Negativeness \Neg"a*tive*ness\, Negativity \Neg`a*tiv"i*ty\, n. The quality or state of being negative. [1913 Webster]

negativity n 1: the disagreeable quality of one who dissents [syn: {negativeness}] [ant: {positiveness}] 2: characterized by habitual skepticism and a tendency to deny or oppose or resist suggestions or commands [syn: {negativism}] [ant: {positivism}] 3: (chemistry) the tendency of an atom or radical to attract electrons in the formation of an ionic bond [syn: {electronegativity}]
